items.sentence: Tom is lucky that Mary was able to help him do that.
I don't know if Tom will go with us tomorrow or not.
I don't know why Tom doesn't want Mary at his party.
I don't need to know why Tom didn't want to do that.
I don't think I can convince Tom to stop doing that.
I don't think I can do that any better than Tom can.
I don't think Tom knows why I'm planning to do that.
I don't want to play any of the songs Tom requested.
I got a book down from the shelf and gave it to Tom.
I have no idea why Tom wanted me to stop doing that.
I should've advised Tom to not talk to Mary anymore.
Do you know what Tom and I are supposed to be doing?
I admit I didn't do what Tom told me I needed to do.
I admitted I didn't do what Tom told me I had to do.
I advised Tom to come back home as soon as he could.
I agreed to meet Tom in front of the school at 2:30.
I didn't know I wasn't supposed to help Tom do that.
I didn't think Tom would be so desperate to do that.
I didn't think Tom would be so motivated to do that.
I didn't think Tom would be so reluctant to do that.
I don't know how Tom and I are going to manage that.
Tom's cousin is much more beautiful than his sister.
I think that you could probably do that by yourself.
You need to cut down on the amount of sugar you eat.
We were stuck in a traffic jam for over three hours.
I usually get up earlier than the rest of my family.
Tom told me he was going to try to be here tomorrow.
I've decided to write 20 sentences a day on Tatoeba.
Tom and Mary never argue in front of their children.
I don't think Tom would ever say anything like that.
With Tom, it feels like nothing I do is ever enough.
That girl over there is the one Tom has been dating.
I waited for Tom all morning, but he didn't show up.
Recently, I've been eating lunch on the front porch.
The reason that Tom got sick was because he overate.
Do you want to stay here or go to the beach with us?
No one's ever been there and lived to tell the tale.
I make a point of writing to my mother once a month.
Both Tom and Mary are planning to be there tomorrow.
I can't remember where I bought this pair of gloves.
This is the first time this has ever happened to me.
I don't have enough money to buy food for my family.
Have you made a list of things that you want to buy?
Tom came home, packed his bags in a hurry, and left.
Maybe Tom doesn't know that that won't happen today.
I want Tom to know I didn't mean for this to happen.
I don't think Tom was responsible for what happened.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all made the same mistake.
Tom, Mary and John all thought that Alice was crazy.
Tom wouldn't tell me how much he bought his car for.
Tom won't likely have to do that until October 20th.
Tom will probably never forgive Mary for doing that.
When Tom saw Mary and John together, he was jealous.
We don't even know if Tom is still in Boston or not.
Tom is expected to be back in Boson by October 20th.
Tom is excited about his upcoming trip to Australia.
Tom is chatting with his friends on the front porch.
Tom informed me that it made him feel uncomfortable.
Tom has never dated a girl whose name ends with "s".
Tom has asked Mary to give him more time to do that.
Tom has already done everything he's supposed to do.
Tom had no idea what Mary was going to cook for him.
Tom got injured in Boston when he was working there.
Tom doesn't know how to get out of the mess he's in.
Tom doesn't have to go to bed if he doesn't want to.
I drove across town to pick up some things I needed.
Tom will probably do that for you if you ask him to.
Tom will likely be able to do everything by himself.
Tom will let you know what time we need to be there.
Tom will go to Australia with us if he has the time.
Tom went up to one of the guys and knocked him down.
Tom went to the convenience store to get some bread.
Tom went to Mary's house to give her some chocolate.
Tom was very pleased with the way things turned out.
Tom was the only boy Mary had really ever talked to.
Tom was the first person to ask me if I needed help.
Tom was my best friend until he stole my girlfriend.
Tom was mugged last night on his way home from work.
Tom was folding his laundry when I entered the room.
Tom was about to leave as Mary walked into the room.
Tom wants us to go swimming with him this afternoon.
Tom wants to know how much ice cream Mary has eaten.
Tom still doesn't know why he's supposed to do that.
Nothing has changed since the beginning of humanity.
A lot of people have asked me why I like doing this.
Tom called the police and waited for them to arrive.
I met with Tom again on October 20th in the morning.
Tom and Mary's first child was born a few hours ago.
If you don't know what you're doing, leave it alone.
Do you really love me from the bottom of your heart?
The purpose of a roundabout is to slow down traffic.
Lake Biwa could be seen from where we were standing.
To my surprise, there were no people in the village.
Tom made it crystal clear he didn't want to do that.
I got up this morning at the same time I usually do.
You're all adults here, so start acting like adults.
The men threatened to kill everyone in the building.
Tom didn't like the sandwich that Mary made for him.
You may go ahead and open the window if you want to.
My short-term memory is getting shorter and shorter.
